member.summary: Holder for reflection information generated from google/devtools/cloudtrace/v1/trace.proto

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceReflection.Descriptor
member.summary: File descriptor for google/devtools/cloudtrace/v1/trace.proto

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Trace
member.summary: A trace describes how long it takes for an application to perform an operation. It consists of a set of spans, each of which represent a single timed event within the operation.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Trace.ProjectIdFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "project_id" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Trace.ProjectId
member.summary: Project ID of the Cloud project where the trace data is stored.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Trace.TraceIdFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "trace_id" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Trace.TraceId
member.summary: Globally unique identifier for the trace. This identifier is a 128-bit numeric value formatted as a 32-byte hex string.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Trace.SpansFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "spans" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Trace.Spans
member.summary: Collection of spans in the trace.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Traces
member.summary: List of new or updated traces.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Traces.Traces_FieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "traces" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Traces.Traces_
member.summary: List of traces.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan
member.summary: A span represents a single timed event within a trace. Spans can be nested and form a trace tree. Often, a trace contains a root span that describes the end-to-end latency of an operation and, optionally, one or more subspans for its suboperations. Spans do not need to be contiguous. There may be gaps between spans in a trace.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.SpanIdFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "span_id" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.SpanId
member.summary: Identifier for the span. Must be a 64-bit integer other than 0 and unique within a trace.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.KindFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "kind" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Kind
member.summary: Distinguishes between spans generated in a particular context. For example, two spans with the same name may be distinguished using `RPC_CLIENT` and `RPC_SERVER` to identify queueing latency associated with the span.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.NameFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "name" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Name
member.summary: Name of the trace. The trace name is sanitized and displayed in the Stackdriver Trace tool in the Google Developers Console. The name may be a method name or some other per-call site name. For the same executable and the same call point, a best practice is to use a consistent name, which makes it easier to correlate cross-trace spans.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.StartTimeFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "start_time" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.StartTime
member.summary: Start time of the span in nanoseconds from the UNIX epoch.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.EndTimeFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "end_time" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.EndTime
member.summary: End time of the span in nanoseconds from the UNIX epoch.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.ParentSpanIdFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "parent_span_id" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.ParentSpanId
member.summary: ID of the parent span, if any. Optional.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.LabelsFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "labels" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Labels
member.summary: Collection of labels associated with the span.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Types
member.summary: Container for nested types declared in the TraceSpan message type.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Types.SpanKind
member.summary: Type of span. Can be used to specify additional relationships between spans in addition to a parent/child relationship.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Types.SpanKind.Unspecified
member.summary: Unspecified.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Types.SpanKind.RpcServer
member.summary: Indicates that the span covers server-side handling of an RPC or other remote network request.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceSpan.Types.SpanKind.RpcClient
member.summary: Indicates that the span covers the client-side wrapper around an RPC or other remote request.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest
member.summary: The request message for the `ListTraces` method. All fields are required unless specified.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.ProjectIdFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "project_id" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.ProjectId
member.summary: ID of the Cloud project where the trace data is stored.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.ViewFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "view" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.View
member.summary: Type of data returned for traces in the list. Optional. Default is `MINIMAL`.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.PageSizeFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "page_size" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.PageSize
member.summary: Maximum number of traces to return. If not specified or <= 0, the implementation selects a reasonable value. The implementation may return fewer traces than the requested page size. Optional.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.PageTokenFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "page_token" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.PageToken
member.summary: Token identifying the page of results to return. If provided, use the value of the `next_page_token` field from a previous request. Optional.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.StartTimeFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "start_time" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.StartTime
member.summary: End of the time interval (inclusive) during which the trace data was collected from the application.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.EndTimeFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "end_time" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.EndTime
member.summary: Start of the time interval (inclusive) during which the trace data was collected from the application.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.FilterFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "filter" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.Filter
member.summary: An optional filter for the request.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.OrderByFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "order_by" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.OrderBy
member.summary:
Field used to sort the returned traces. Optional. Can be one of the following:
* `trace_id` * `name` (`name` field of root span in the trace) * `duration` (difference between `end_time` and `start_time` fields of the root span) * `start` (`start_time` field of the root span)
Descending order can be specified by appending `desc` to the sort field (for example, `name desc`).
Only one sort field is permitted.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.Types
member.summary: Container for nested types declared in the ListTracesRequest message type.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.Types.ViewType
member.summary: Type of data returned for traces in the list.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.Types.ViewType.Unspecified
member.summary: Default is `MINIMAL` if unspecified.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.Types.ViewType.Minimal
member.summary: Minimal view of the trace record that contains only the project and trace IDs.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.Types.ViewType.Rootspan
member.summary: Root span view of the trace record that returns the root spans along with the minimal trace data.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest.Types.ViewType.Complete
member.summary: Complete view of the trace record that contains the actual trace data. This is equivalent to calling the REST `get` or RPC `GetTrace` method using the ID of each listed trace.

member.summary: Field number for the "traces" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesResponse.Traces
member.summary: List of trace records returned.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesResponse.NextPageTokenFieldNumber
member.summary: Field number for the "next_page_token" field.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesResponse.NextPageToken
member.summary: If defined, indicates that there are more traces that match the request and that this value should be passed to the next request to continue retrieving additional traces.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceService
member.summary: This file describes an API for collecting and viewing traces and spans within a trace. A Trace is a collection of spans corresponding to a single operation or set of operations for an application. A span is an individual timed event which forms a node of the trace tree. Spans for a single trace may span multiple services.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceService.Descriptor
member.summary: Service descriptor

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceService.TraceServiceBase
member.summary: Base class for server-side implementations of TraceService

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceService.TraceServiceBase.ListTraces(Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.ListTracesRequest,Grpc.Core.ServerCallContext)
member.summary: Returns of a list of traces that match the specified filter conditions.
member.param: The request received from the client.
The context of the server-side call handler being invoked.
member.returns: The response to send back to the client (wrapped by a task).

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceService.TraceServiceBase.GetTrace(Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.GetTraceRequest,Grpc.Core.ServerCallContext)
member.summary: Gets a single trace by its ID.
member.param: The request received from the client.
The context of the server-side call handler being invoked.
member.returns: The response to send back to the client (wrapped by a task).

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceService.TraceServiceBase.PatchTraces(Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.PatchTracesRequest,Grpc.Core.ServerCallContext)
member.summary: Sends new traces to Stackdriver Trace or updates existing traces. If the ID of a trace that you send matches that of an existing trace, any fields in the existing trace and its spans are overwritten by the provided values, and any new fields provided are merged with the existing trace data. If the ID does not match, a new trace is created.
member.param: The request received from the client.
The context of the server-side call handler being invoked.
member.returns: The response to send back to the client (wrapped by a task).

member.remarks: The eligible RPC s for retry for "Idempotent" RPC methods are:

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceServiceSettings.NonIdempotentRetryFilter

member.remarks: The eligible RPC s for retry for "NonIdempotent" RPC methods are:

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceServiceSettings.GetDefaultRetryBackoff
member.summary: "Default" retry backoff for RPC methods.
member.returns: The "Default" retry backoff for RPC methods.
member.remarks:
The "Default" retry backoff for RPC methods is defined as:
Initial delay: 100 milliseconds
Maximum delay: 1000 milliseconds
Delay multiplier: 1.2

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceServiceSettings.GetDefaultTimeoutBackoff
member.summary: "Default" timeout backoff for RPC methods.
member.returns: The "Default" timeout backoff for RPC methods.
member.remarks:
The "Default" timeout backoff for RPC methods is defined as:
Initial timeout: 20000 milliseconds
Timeout multiplier: 1.5
Maximum timeout: 30000 milliseconds

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceServiceSettings.PatchTracesSettings
member.summary: for synchronous and asynchronous calls to TraceServiceClient.PatchTraces and TraceServiceClient.PatchTracesAsync.
member.remarks:
The default TraceServiceClient.PatchTraces and TraceServiceClient.PatchTracesAsync are:
Initial retry delay: 100 milliseconds
Retry delay multiplier: 1.2
Retry maximum delay: 1000 milliseconds
Initial timeout: 20000 milliseconds
Timeout multiplier: 1.5
Timeout maximum delay: 30000 milliseconds
Retry will be attempted on the following response status codes:
Default RPC expiration is 45000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceServiceSettings.GetTraceSettings
member.summary: for synchronous and asynchronous calls to TraceServiceClient.GetTrace and TraceServiceClient.GetTraceAsync.
member.remarks:

Initial retry delay: 100 milliseconds
Retry delay multiplier: 1.2
Retry maximum delay: 1000 milliseconds
Initial timeout: 20000 milliseconds
Timeout multiplier: 1.5
Timeout maximum delay: 30000 milliseconds
Retry will be attempted on the following response status codes:
Default RPC expiration is 45000 milliseconds.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.TraceServiceClient.PatchTraces(System.String,Google.Cloud.Trace.V1.Traces,Google.Api.Gax.Grpc.CallSettings)
member.summary: Sends new traces to Stackdriver Trace or updates existing traces. If the ID of a trace that you send matches that of an existing trace, any fields in the existing trace and its spans are overwritten by the provided values, and any new fields provided are merged with the existing trace data. If the ID does not match, a new trace is created.
member.param: ID of the Cloud project where the trace data is stored.
The body of the message.
If not null, applies overrides to this RPC call.
member.returns: The RPC response.

member.summary: Returns of a list of traces that match the specified filter conditions.

The token returned from the previous request. A value of null or an empty string retrieves the first page.
The size of page to request. The response will not be larger than this, but may be smaller. A value of null or 0 uses a server-defined page size.
